channel.title: SevenAtSevenSection1
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenSection1, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: America's immigration crackdown is disrupting the global remittance market
item.description: America's immigration crackdown might have serious financial consequences for a range of countries.

item.title: Fight over government layoffs continues as shutdown drags on

item.title: Volunteers foster literacy by reading to children and giving them books
item.description: Volunteers with the LiTEArary society read to children who live in "book deserts" and bring them their own books.

item.title: Chicago’s children are getting caught in the chaos of immigration crackdowns
CEO of Alphabet’s X, Astro Teller, on what makes a moonshot
item.description: Teller says X has a 2% hit rate, which means that most of the things the company tries don't work out, and that's okay.

item.title: Zoom CEO Eric Yuan says AI will shorten our workweek
item.description: Zoom CEO Eric Yuan says that, in a few years, we should be working a 3-4 day workweek because of AI.

item.title: PayPal partners with OpenAI to let users pay for their shopping within ChatGPT

item.title: Food banks are preparing for a surge as federal food aid could be paused in the government shutdown
item.description: Food banks and pantries are preparing for a surge in demand if federal food aid is paused this weekend from the government shutdown.

item.description: ChatGPT Go is now free for Indian users under a limited-time promotional offer.
